BEBaseFoundation.stf_meta_keywords: event venues, event planning, events in Australia, incentives in Australia, MICE in Australia, business in Australia, meeting planners, conventions, congresses, association events in Australia, news
BEBaseFoundation.stf_meta_description: Find the latest news and statistics on business events in Australia. Media releases, articles and industry updates from Australia.
BEBaseFoundation.stf_PageTitle: Australia - Meetings, Incentives and Conferences – Official Website

BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Venues with a view 
With state of the art facilities, Australia offers unique and exciting conference destinations with arguably some of the best views in the world.

Australian destinations fit for royalty
Here we look at four destinations that are not only fit for royalty and world leaders but are home to Australia’s newest conference and incentive products.

There’s nothing like Australia to try something new
Australia has always been an action-packed destination, and now there are even more activities to choose from.

Expanded accommodation at luxurious Central Coast luxury retreat
One of Australia’s most loved luxury retreats nestled away on Sydney’s Central Coast, will open its doors to 14 brand new architect-designed deluxe suites and villas

Makepeace Island available for private lease
Sir Richard Branson’s exclusive resort, Makepeace Island, located in Noosa on the Sunshine Coast, is now available for private lease.

New Star in Sydney
In September, Sydney’s Star City Casino will re-launch as the Star, a one of a kind destination for business events visitors and a stand-out feature of any incentive itinerary.
